title: Meet Aurous, the ‘Popcorn Time for music’ app you’ve been waiting for
text:
Meet Aurous, the ‘Popcorn Time for music’ app you’ve been waiting for 
Published By: BGR.com - Today 
Despite its questionable legality, Popcorn Time’s popularity hasn’t diminished much since the original forks launched in 2014. In fact,...
